page.title: 06BURWELL ANTI_NUCLEAR GROUP.
page.content: Burwell Anti Nuclear Group{(B.A.N.G) has been running for six years.It is held in people's houses or if it is important they hire the Phoenix Room at the Village College.One member joined the group because she is concerned about being killed by{The {Bomb,}as we are close to several large {American bases.}She not only protests against{cruise missiles}and nuclear weapons she protests against all nuclear power.She goes on{protest {marches}with other people.The latest one was at{Molesworth}this spring.The group has a publicity officer. They hope that governments will realize what damage the bomb will do.There are over{100 members. It was also feared that some nuclear waste might be dumped here.
